import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { FoodService } from 'src/app/services/food.service'; import { Tag } from 'src/app/shared/models/Tag'; @Component({ selector: 'app-tags', templateUrl: './tags.component.html', styleUrls: ['./tags.component.css'] }) export class TagsComponent implements OnInit{ tags?:Tag[]; constructor(foodservice: FoodService) { this.tags = foodservice.getAllTags(); } ngOnInit(): void { } }
